about_the_game:
Special thanks to Violet. Without her sacrifice, this game would not be here.


Everything Ends In 0 is a game about the end of the world, but you are not a hero destined to save it. In fact, it can't be saved at all - from the moment you start playing, The World is already doomed.

No twist, no fine print, no loopholes, no technicalities. Everything. Will. Die. All you can do is wait for it to be over.

And hey! while you're at it, why not strike up a friendly conversation? I hear you're quite similar to a couple of those girls, and quite intriguing to a couple others. Besides, it's not like the awkward moments will really matter in just a little bit. So listen to them for a while, to pass the time!

Or don't.

Again, it really does not matter.

You are going to die.

CONTROLS:

[Z] select
[X] "return"
[ARROWS] lose yourself
[MOUSE] admire your new forever home
[W] move forward
[Z] gather

highlighted.name: Ah my friends and oh my other friends
What Else Would Fate Have Us Make
Don't let them kill you, darling
Two Hundred and Two Trillion Digits

content_descriptors.notes: this game, among many other things, is about death, regret, great distress, and grief. the world ends, and you cannot save it.

Besides, it's not like the awkward moments will really matter in just a little bit. So listen to them for a while, to pass the time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“What I didn't expect was how relatable it would become. [...] This will hit you deeply.”
a beautiful little game – the monotonist

“About as bizarre and different as artsy videogames get.”
weird – Clark

“This game is Tamhsrebog approved, very nice”
Tamhsrebog approved – Tamhsrebog
short_description: The world ends in 1 hour. It can't be saved. Wanna chat?
